duties_responsibilities.duty: Generate new business through presale preparation, prospecting, cold calling, and lead follow-up.
Negotiate and close sales opportunities, and further develop current client base through consultative sales approach.
Provide accurate forecasts and continual tracking of prospect targets, sales opportunities, and sales proposal stages via SFDC.
Coordinate sales efforts with team members and other departments.
Meet and exceed monthly and annual sales quotas, and handle complaints and negotiations.
Stay current on company offerings and industry trends, and build long-lasting, mutually beneficial relationships with external contacts and internal departments.
Present and demonstrate the value of products and services to prospective buyers, and thrive as the ultimate team player and treat everyone with respect.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Sales, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
